channel.title: iDigital
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from iDigital, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The White House just issued new AI chip export limits; Nvidia stock is lower.
item.description: The White House on Monday announced new restrictions on artificial intelligence exports that will impact companies including Nvidia.

item.title: AI is set to transform education — what enterprise leaders can learn from this development
item.description: Unbound Academy will replace teachers with AI tools, representing the latest chapter in a 60-year quest in computer assisted instruction.

item.title: Listen to your technology users — they have led to the most disruptive innovations in history
item.description: Technology users can be a source of ingenious ideas rather than a barrier. Here's how to seek out innovative disruption.

item.title: Krafton and Nvidia team up to create smarter AI characters for PUBG and inZOI
item.description: Nvidia and Krafton unveiled a groundbreaking on-device AI that will enable smarter AI characters for PUBG and inZoi.

item.title: The bull market is still intact, this strategist says. This pullback is just the cost of doing business.

item.title: The 13 best ideas, products and services of CES 2025 | The DeanBeat
item.description: As one of 6,000 journalists at the show, I walked around a lot to find the coolest tech. My conclusion: The robots are coming.

item.title: ‘I reaped financial rewards’: I’m 51. My wife is 60. I have $4 million in savings. Should I give up my $300K advisory job to spend time with my wife?

item.title: OpenAI has begun building out its robotics team
item.description: Previously, OpenAI partnered with robotics startup Figure to provide the models powering the latter's humanoid robots.
